name: Noddy on Television. Enid Blyton's Famous Toy. Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
red and yellow.

	Yes - Noddy's car is red and yellow. It also goes "Parp! Parp!" when Noddy talks to it.

questions.text: Complete the following saying by the Toyland Policeman - "Halt in the name of ...."?
questions.explanation:
Plod.

	Mr. Plod is the Toyland Policeman. His house is actually shaped like a policeman's helmet.  Police officers usually say "Halt in the name of the law", but Plod gets mixed up!

questions.text: Where does the Bumpy Dog live?
questions.explanation:
at Tessie Bear's house.

	The Bumpy Dog lives at Tessie Bear's house but is often around Toytown getting into trouble. Tessie Bear also keeps chickens.

Mr. Sparks

	Mr. Sparks often helps to fill Noddy's car with fuel. He is also very good at fixing all sorts of things.

questions.text: Who always helps to wind up his friend the Clockwork Mouse ?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Jumbo

	Mr. Jumbo is a very friendly character. In story we learn that there are lots of elephants in his family.

questions.text: Which person in Toytown often rides a bicycle?
questions.explanation:
Big Ears.

	In one story Big Ears and Noddy swap over. Noddy rides the bicycle and Big Ears drives Noddy's car.

questions.text: Who has a market stall or shop in the town square?
questions.explanation:
Dinah Doll.

	Dinah sells all sorts of things. Sometimes Noddy goes to the station to fetch her parcels that she sells to the people of Toytown.

questions.text: What are the two naughty goblins called?
questions.explanation:
Sly and Gobbo.

	Sly and Gobbo do lots of naughty things. They really like to trick Noddy and to try to drive his car. They live in the Dark Wood.

questions.text: What is the Bumpy Dog always doing?
questions.correct: knocking people down and licking them
options: running round after the ducks on the pond
questions.explanation:
knocking people down and licking them.

	Bumpy Dog is really very friendly. He is always pleased to see Noddy. I don't think Mr. Plod has got a cat.

options: he works in gardens for people
he sells things in the market stall
he helps to fix cars and bicycles
questions.explanation:
he is a taxi driver.

	Noddy drives all over Toyland. Lots of the stories show him at Toyland station picking up passengers or collecting parcels.
